Table of Contents

Class - VariantException

Module
std.variant
public class VariantException
{

  // The source type in the conversion or comparison 
  TypeInfo source;
  // The target type in the conversion or comparison 
  TypeInfo target;
}

About

Thrown in three cases

$(OL $(LI An uninitialized Variant is used in any way except assignment and hasValue ;) $(LI A get or coerce is attempted with an incompatible target type;) $(LI A comparison between Variant objects of incompatible types is attempted.))

Variables

Name Description
source The source type in the conversion or comparison
target The target type in the conversion or comparison
